rows: Unable to randomize within 14 days after onset of acute respiratory infection symptoms
Inability to be contacted on Day 29-36 for clinical outcome assessment
Receipt of COVID-19 convalescent plasma or pooled immunoglobulin in the past 30 days
Contraindications to transfusion or history of prior reactions to transfused blood products
Plan for hospital discharge within 24 hours of enrollment
Enrollment in another clinical trial evaluating monoclonal antibodies
